name: Crazy Toad
description: A breakout style game with a fun twist. In Crazy Toad you control an old gnome who is carrying a huge mushroom, and your objective is to keep up with the bouncing toad, not letting it fall to the ground.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: XP Processor: Intel single core Graphics: 2004 GPU Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: Intel multi core Graphics: 2010 GPU Storage: 200 MB available space
